summary: An ordinance relating to the claims of the Puget Sound Bridge & Dredging Company resulting from the improvement of 9th Avenue South, et al., grading, etc., under Ordinance No. 44472, LID No. 3444, and Golf Drive, grading, under Ordinance No. 44471; appropriating money from the Water Fund and from the "Emergency Fund" created by Ordinance No. 50945 to said company in payment of said claims, and declaring the emergency making necessary said appropriation from the "Emergency Fund".
